auto_execute_script.message: Automatically execute the script when YouTube is loaded in a tab

auto_hide_cards_end_screens.message: Automatically hide info cards and end screens

auto_sort_comments.message: Automatically sort comments from newest to oldest

block_hfr_formats.message: Force the use of standard frame rates formats (24, 25, 30 FPS) instead of high frame rates formats (48, 50, 60 FPS)

block_webm_formats.message: Force the use of the MP4 format and the AVC codec (H.264) instead of the WebM format and the VP9 codec (maximum resolution: 1080p60 HD)

bottom_of_window.message: At the bottom of the window

cards_end_screens_control_info.message: Click to toggle info cards and end screens visibility

center_control_bar.message: Centre the control bar below the video player when it is expanded or when the full screen mode is active

center_video_player.message: Centre the video player within the viewport

cinema_mode_control_info.message: Click to toggle the cinema mode

cinema_mode_toggle_size.message: Automatically expand or shrink the video player when the cinema mode is toggled

control_speed.message: Control the playback speed with the mouse wheel when the mouse cursor is over the video player and the ‘Control’ key (Ctrl) is pressed

control_speed_mouse_button.message: Only when the right mouse button is pressed

control_volume.message: Control the volume level with the mouse wheel when hovering over the video player with the mouse cursor

control_volume_mouse_button.message: Only when the right mouse button is pressed

controls_visible.message: Keep controls visible without having to click the ••• control or hover over it with the mouse cursor

controls_within_control_bar.message: Place controls within a control bar

controls_within_video_player.message: Place controls within the video player

custom_script_control_info.message: Click to execute the custom script

custom_script_instructions.message: Paste or type your JavaScript code here, save it using the button below, then click on the ‘Custom script’ control when you want to execute it.

custom_script_warning.message: For security reasons you should only use code that you understand or code that has been written by a developer you trust.

custom_theme_instructions.message: Paste or type your CSS code here then save it using the button below.

description.message: Take control of YouTube and boost your user experience!

detailed_description.message:
Enhancer for YouTube™ is the ultimate tool to supercharge your YouTube experience with a host of highly customizable features, making it smoother and more enjoyable. Whether you’re looking to fine-tune playback settings or customize the look and feel, this YouTube enhancer gives you complete control to tailor YouTube to your needs.

Key Features:

Video Playback:
• Quickly adjust playback speed, quality, volume, and more with the mouse wheel or keyboard shortcuts.
• Playback Speed: Set a default playback speed and adjust it anywhere from 0.07x to 16x while watching.
• Playback Quality: Set a default playback quality for videos, playlists, and embedded videos.
• Volume Booster: Boost volume and bass for louder, clearer sound (up to 10x audio boost).
• Enhanced Loop Mode: Repeat specific parts or the entire video effortlessly.
• Autoplay Control: Fine-tune or disable YouTube’s autoplay features for better control.
• Video Formats: Disable high frame rate formats (60fps).

Appearance and Themes:
• Video Filters: Adjust brightness, contrast, color, and more without changing your monitor's settings.
• Enhanced Dark Mode: Enjoy a sleek, eye-friendly interface with the built-in Dark Theme and its 50+ variants.
• Custom Themes: Personalize YouTube's appearance with custom themes to suit your style.
• Cinema Mode: Dim everything around the player to keep your focus on the video.

Video Player:
• Wide Player: Expand the player beyond the default Theater Mode, or fill the entire screen without going full screen.
• Mini Player: Keep watching while reading comments so you never miss a moment.
• Pop-up Player: Watch videos in a resizable window while multitasking or browsing other content.

Distractions and Shorts:
• Block Distractions: Hide end screens, info cards, recommendations, related videos, chat, or comments.
• YouTube Shorts: Hide Shorts or watch Shorts like regular videos.

Other Features:
• Screenshot: Capture high-quality screenshots of your favorite video moments.
• Keyboard Shortcuts: Set up customizable keyboard shortcuts to control YouTube like a pro.
• Reverse Playlists: Watch playlists in reverse order for a fresh viewing experience.

And more!

Get the most popular YouTube enhancer now and transform the way you watch YouTube forever!

-----

Enhancer for YouTube™ is a third-party extension and is not affiliated with YouTube.
YouTube is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.

display_control_bar.message: Display the control bar only when hovering over it with the mouse cursor

expand_shrink_video_player.message: Expand or shrink the video player

expanded_player_viewport.message: Use the available space based on the viewport dimensions to expand the video player

export_instructions.message: Create a new text file and paste the code below without modifying it.

flip_horizontally_control_info.message: Click to flip the video horizontally

flip_vertically_control_info.message: Click to flip the video vertically

focus_video_player.message: Set focus on the video player

ignore_playlists.message: Do not prevent autoplay for playlists

import_error.message: The content of the backup file is not valid!

import_instructions.message: Paste the content of the backup file and click the ‘Import’ button. The page will be automatically reloaded if settings are successfully imported.

keyboard_shortcuts_control_info.message: Click to display the list of all the keyboard shortcuts for YouTube (external page)

keyboard_shortcuts_page.message: Display all the keyboard shortcuts for YouTube

launch_mini_player.message: Launch a mini player when scrolling down to read comments

loop_control_info.message: Click or right-click to toggle the loop mode

options_control_info.message: Click to open the options page

page_reload_required.message: Enhancer for YouTube™ has just been updated, all the YouTube pages must be reloaded.

pause_videos.message: Pause videos playing in background tabs when a video starts playing in the foreground tab

pop_up_player_control_info.message: Click or right-click to watch with the pop-up player

pop_up_player_embeds_full_screen.message: Pop-up player and embedded videos (full screen):

preserve_black_bars_color.message: Do not change the colour of the vertical black bars when the YouTube-DeepDark theme is applied or when the cinema mode is enabled

prevent_autoplay.message: Prevent videos loaded in background tabs from automatically playing

prevent_autoplay_foreground_tab.message: Prevent videos loaded in the foreground tab from automatically playing as well

rate_extension.message: Rate your experience with Enhancer for YouTube™.

reverse_mouse_wheel_direction.message: Reverse the mouse wheel direction to control the playback speed and the volume level

reverse_playlist_control_info.message: Click or right-click to watch a playlist in reverse order with the pop-up player

screenshot_control_info.message: Click to take a screenshot of the video

select_quality_full_screen.message: Select a different playback quality when entering the full screen mode

size_control_info.message: Click to expand or shrink the video player or right-click to centre the video player within the viewport

speed_control_info.message: Use the mouse wheel to control the playback speed or click to select the default playback speed or right-click to select the normal playback speed

speed_minus_control_info.message: Click to decrease the playback speed

speed_plus_control_info.message: Click to increase the playback speed

speed_variation.message: Speed variation when rotating the mouse wheel or when clicking the speed buttons ‘-’ and ‘+’:

stop_videos.message: Completely stop videos instead of only preventing autoplay

switch_back_previous_quality.message: Switch back to the previous playback quality when exiting the full screen mode

take_screenshot.message: Take a screenshot of the video

toggle_cards_end_screens.message: Toggle info cards and end screens visibility

video_filters_control_info.message: Click to toggle the video filters or right-click to toggle the video filters panel visibility

volume_booster_control_info.message: Click to toggle the volume booster

volume_variation.message: Volume variation when rotating the mouse wheel:
